name: ufront-mvc
description: MVC Framework that is at the core of ufront.
releasenote:
Various important PHP fixes (for working with POST data).
    Uploads working in PHP now.
    Use @layout @viewFolder and @template metadata in ViewResult.
    Add UfrontConfiguration.templatingEngine and defaults.
    Cleanup of Error Page template, no longer relies on Bootstrap CDN.
    Add TemplateData.exists()
    Fix for getting floats during routing.
    Better error messages when you get a BadRequest during routing.
    Allow async requests in RemotingHandler, prepare for new UFAsyncApi<T> proxies.
